reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Their prices are fair as well for the professional work they do." "The quality of workmanship is unsurpassed." "Great Exteriors did a fantastic job replacing an existing one story deck."

Jeremy and the crews of Great Exteriors did an amazing job on our rooftop deck. They had to demo the original, remove it from the 3rd story rooftop, place the new trek material on the rooftop, then build it. It was not an easy job and they made it look easy. I highly recommend Great Exteriors.
Jeremy and his crew did a fantastic job on our deck. Everything happened exactly as Jeremy described it would.  The quality of workmanship is unsurpassed. We could not be more happy with the outcome.

Jeremy and his partner did outstanding job on 2nd portion of my fence. 1st portion was done like 5 years ago. I had to do in sections as being on limited income. Their prices are fair as well for the professional work they do. I highly recommend them to anyone considering putting in new fence . Thanks again Jeremy !!
